Text: <c.white><c.mono_sans>your arm ring and become a man?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>So where do you think the Earl</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>is going to send us this year?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Then you are too far south, and</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>But what if there is no sun?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>If it wasn't murder, why did you</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>You knew I had a claim to it...</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>to both the land and the sea.</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>Any oath that you swear on these</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>but we also want to know where</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>But I tell you that I will not</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>What do you know of it? Hmm?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>and therefore he will want to do</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>How will my men set their oars?</c.mono_sans></c.white>
<c.white><c.mono_sans>I told you I could do it!</c.mono_sans></c.white>
